segments.text: This kitchen is a total mess, and it's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere from that overflowing sink, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, unaware, like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet, and the puddle's spreading filthily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse with their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on a shaky stool, crumbs probably falling into the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar's open, inviting ants or whatever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching in, hands all sticky no doubt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor will be slippery and nasty soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets dripping, dishes stacked waiting to topple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside looks clean, but inside it's disgusting chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how sloppy and unclean this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean up before it's unbearable.
segments.speaker: PAR
